title: Electric vehicle pay-per-mile tax could 'hinder' petrol switch
description: Electric vehicle drivers will soon face a pay-per-mile tax as 2030 deadline to phase out petrol and diesel cars looms.
content:
Charging electric vehicle owners tax per mile could "cause friction" in the drive to phase out diesel and petrol cars, according to the boss of an electric car leasing firm.
It was confirmed in Wednesday's Budget that electric car drivers will pay a ... [441 chars]

title: Palestine Action like the Suffragettes, court told
description: Lawyers for the group say the government's ban is unprecedented, as they launch a legal challenge.
content:
Lawyers for Palestine Action have said the group can be compared to the suffragettes, in a challenge against the government's ban.
On the first day of a three day judicial review at the High Court, lawyers for the group's co-founder Huda Ammori said ... [3487 chars]

title: Spacey set to face civil sex assault claims in court in 2026
description: Three men have sued the Oscar-winning actor, alleging that he assaulted them between 2000 and 2013.
content:
Actor Kevin Spacey is set to face civil claims of sexual assault from three men at the High Court in London next October.
The men have sued the star, alleging that he assaulted them between 2000 and 2013.
At a hearing on Wednesday, a judge suggested ... [1967 chars]

title: Two-child benefit cap to be scrapped from next year
description: The policy, introduced under the Tories, means parents can only claim universal credit for their first two children.
content:
The two-child benefit cap will be scrapped in full from next April, Chancellor Rachel Reeves has said.
The policy, introduced under the Conservatives in 2017, means parents can only claim universal credit or tax credits for their first two children.

title: Arrests at farmers' central London tractor protest
description: The tractors drove to Parliament on Budget day in a protest over inheritance tax.
content:
5 hours ago
Stuart MaisnerSouth East
Several arrests were made as farmers drove tractors into central London for a Budget day protest over plans to put inheritance tax on farm businesses worth more than £1m.
